mapper.sql: select a.ARRANGE_ID arrangeId,a.YEAR_ID yearId,sc.NAME yearName, a.term_id termId,term.NAME termName,a.SUBJECT_ID subjectId,sub.name subjectName, a.period,credit,upper_limit upperLimit,LOWER_LIMIT lowerLimit,classroom, a.TEACHER_ID teacherId,te.NAME teacherName, (select group_concat(g.grade_id) from t_lesson_select_grade g where g.arrange_id=a.arrange_id) gradeIdsStr from t_lesson_select_arrange a left join t_school_year sc on a.year_id=sc.YEAR_ID left join t_term term on term.TERM_ID=a.TERM_ID left join t_subject sub on sub.SUBJECT_ID=a.SUBJECT_ID left join t_teacher te on te.TEACHER_ID=a.TEACHER_ID

select st.time_id timeId,st.ARRANGE_ID arrangeId,st.PERIOD_ID periodId,lp.SEQ periodSeq,st.WEEK_DAY weekDay from t_lesson_select_time st left join t_lesson_select_arrange a on st.ARRANGE_ID=a.ARRANGE_ID left join t_lesson_period lp on st.PERIOD_ID=lp.PERIOD_ID
